trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged"> </xref> ou <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected"> </xref> eventos do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged> event occurs when the currently selected date or range of dates changes; for example, when the user explicitly changes a selection within the current month or when the selection is implicitly changed in response to next/previous month navigation.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged>evento ocorre quando a data atualmente selecionada ou intervalo de datas alterações; por exemplo, quando o utilizador explicitamente altera uma seleção no mês atual, ou quando a seleção implicitamente é alterada em resposta a navegação de mês seguinte/anterior.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected> event occurs when the user explicitly changes a selection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected>evento ocorre quando o utilizador altera explicitamente uma seleção.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar.DateSelected>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor specifies the start and end for the new date range that has been selected.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>construtor Especifica o início e de fim para o intervalo de datas novo que foi seleccionado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If a single date is selected, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.End%2A> property values will be equal.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se for selecionada uma data único, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.Start%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.End%2A>valores de propriedade serão iguais.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.End%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.End%2A> property values are set by the `start` and `end` parameter values of this constructor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.Start%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.End%2A>valores de propriedade são definidos pelo `start` e `end` valores de parâmetro deste construtor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.End%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateRangeEventArgs.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first date/time value in the range that the user has selected.
trans-unit.target: O primeiro valor de data/hora no intervalo de que o utilizador tiver selecionado.

trans-unit.source: The last date/time value in the range that the user has selected.
trans-unit.target: O último valor de data/hora no intervalo de que o utilizador tiver selecionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the last date/time value in the range that the user has selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o último valor de data/hora num intervalo que o utilizador tiver selecionado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the last date in the date range that the user has selected.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>que representa a última data no intervalo de datas que o utilizador tiver selecionado.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Gets the first date/time value in the range that the user has selected.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o primeiro valor de data/hora num intervalo que o utilizador tiver selecionado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the first date in the date range that the user has selected.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>que representa a data da primeira no intervalo de datas que o utilizador tiver selecionado.</xref:System.DateTime>
